text: The following television stations in the United States brand as channel 12 (though neither using virtual channel 12 nor broadcasting on physical RF channel 12): * KGNS-DT2 in Laredo, Texas * KNCT in Belton, Texas * KTVZ-DT2 in Bend, Oregon * WMYT-TV in Rock Hill, South Carolina 12 branded
title: Channel 12 branded TV stations in the United States
